Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

treefit 1.0.2

Improvements

  • Added support for testing with MKL. #1 #2 Patch by kokitsuyuzaki.

Thanks

  • kokitsuyuzaki

treefit 1.0.12021-03-22

Improvements

  • generate_n_arms_star_data: Added a multi-dimensional star tree data generator.

  • Added Ryohei Suzuki and Hiromi Ishii to authors.

  • venettes: Stopped to require Seurat that is a suggested package.

Fixes

  • rms_cca_distance: Fixed wrong calculation.

treefit 1.0.02020-03-10

The initial release.
